creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-158: Should (maybe) be possible to index returned values from multi-return functions
description:
```
  majors = sort([parse_int(t[0])[0] for t in tags])
                 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Cannot index into multiple values
```

that [0] is intended to index into the _first_ return value of `parse_int`, but it errors instead. Should perhaps be allowed?
